Fact Sheet 

OVERLOOKING THE HISTORIC KEY WEST HARBOR — THE MARKER WATERFRONT RESORT KEY WEST IS A LUXURIOUS COMPOUND WITH A SENSE OF REFUGE AND RETREAT — LOCATED IN THE CENTER OF IT ALL.

The Marker Waterfront Resort, Old Town Key West’s first new build resort in 20 years, is ideally located on the Historic Key West Harbor just steps from lively Duval Street. This modern, waterfront resort offers a hidden sanctuary of lush gardenfilled grounds, three salt water pools, and an openair restaurant and bar for al fresco dining. Each of the resort’s 96 spacious and luxuriously appointed guestrooms feature a private balcony, unexpected design flourishes and Key West-inspired touches,including a collection of art, books and local amenities. The Marker is a tropical oasis set within a vibrant, free spirited paradise filled with sun, art, Key West culture and the laid back island lifestyle.

GUEST ROOMS & SUITES

The Marker Waterfront Resort is home to 96 tropicallyinspired contemporary and luxurious guest rooms featuring luxe fabrics, plush bedding and a curated collection of art, literary works, and thoughtful local amenities that adorn the book shelves. The Marker’s accommodations feature one king or 2 queen beds plus a variety of view types including our serene pool view, tropical garden view and Key West Harbor view. Designed with you in mind, The Marker’s guest rooms are uniquely positioned to offer a variety of opportunities for relaxation, rejuvenation and reviving.

IN-ROOM AMENITIES 

  • Private balcony
  • Daily turndown service
  • Key West Aloe bath amenities
  • Keurig Coffee Maker
  • Complimentary wireless Internet access
  • Soaking tub and walk-in rain shower
  • 42” flat panel HDTV
  • Refrigerator
  • In-room safe
  • Signature bathrobes
  • Hairdryer, iron & ironing board 

RESORT AMENITIES

  • Signature welcome cocktail at check-in
  • 3 salt water pools (including the adult only Serenity Pool)
  • Harbor House – brand new meeting & event space with 3 walls of windows
  • Poolside Restaurant and Bar
  • Poolside service
  • Plush pool towels
  • 24-hour Fitness Center
  • Complimentary Business Center
  • On-Site Garage Parking ($20 plus tax per day)
  • Concierge Service
  • Bicycle Rentals 

LOCATION

  • Historic Seaport
  • Old Town Key West
  • World-famous Mallory Square and Duval Street
  • Museums – Mel Fisher Maritime Museum & Key West Art and History Museum
  • Ernest Hemingway House & Truman Little White House
  • Key West Aquarium
  • Fort Zachary State Park
